info.name: Duolingo Dark Theme [V1.0.2]
info.description: A Dark Theme for Duolingo so you can keep learning languages in the dark!
info.additionalInfo: Version 1.0.2 Multiple choice questions appear normal again. The fullscreen Duolingo Plus ad is fully dark again. Version 1.0.1 More exercises are now dark. Word hover explanations are now more readable. The Duolingo Plus fullscreen ad is now dark. Version 1.0 Initial release.
